title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, 2 purples and black applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow over blue for green (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 24.5 x 11.5 cm (9 5/8 x 4 1/2 in.)
description: Ribbon-tied stems of flowers. Design is an Indian adaption of a European woven fabric as part of the motif is a mirror image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, 2 purples and black applied by pen or brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow over blue for green (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-74.
